subject: Personal Finance
title: Required Minimum Distributions
description: A fast breakdown of Required Minimum Distributions for builders.

hook.text: At age 73, the IRS forces you to withdraw from your 401(k) and IRA â€” whether you need the money or not.

buildup.text: Required Minimum Distributions ensure the government eventually collects taxes on tax-deferred savings.

discovery.text: The amount increases each year. By your 80s, RMDs can push you into higher tax brackets.

twist.text: Missing an RMD triggers a 25% penalty on the amount you should have withdrawn. Expensive oversight.

climax.text: Roth accounts have no RMDs during your lifetime. That flexibility makes Roth conversions attractive before 73.

punchline.text: The tax man always gets paid. RMDs ensure it.

quiz.question: What is the penalty for missing a Required Minimum Distribution?
options: 25% of the amount that should have been withdrawn
